6.title: Divine Relics (IV)
6.description: Level up a 4-star Relic to Max level

7.title: Divine Relics (V)
7.description: Level up a 5-star Relic to Max level

11.title: Ever-Burning Amber
11.description: Tread on the Path of Preservation
11.comment: Unlock Fire Trailblazer during the main story

12.title: I Have Finished The Race
12.description: Level up all Traces for a character to the maximum level

13.title: My Childhood
13.description: Reach Character Level 40 with any character

14.title: My Apprenticeship
14.description: Reach Character Level 60 with any character

15.title: My Universities
15.description: Reach Character Level 80 with any character

16.title: Path Traces (I)
16.description: Activate or level up character Traces 3 time(s)

17.title: Path Traces (II)
17.description: Activate or level up character Traces 20 time(s)

18.title: Path Traces (III)
18.description: Activate or level up character Traces 50 time(s)

19.title: Path Traces (IV)
19.description: Activate or level up character Traces 100 time(s)

20.title: Sovereign Warframe
20.description: Equip a character with level 15 5-star Relics in all slots

22.title: A Professional Onlooker
22.comment: Find Qingque, who is "working hard" at playing games.

24.title: Everwinter Night
24.comment: You have arrived at the city of Belobog.

25.title: Half the Wizard of Oz
25.description: Defeat the tin man and the little girl
25.comment: Svarog and Clara became your friends!

27.title: My Heart Lies With the Stars
27.description: Launch a journey into the vast Galaxy
27.comment: Congratulations! You have boarded the Astral Express!

28.title: Omniscia Spares None
28.comment: Successfully capture the Stellaron Hunter Kafka.

29.title: Prophets Do Not Prophesize
29.description: Witness the mystery of the Divination Commission's matrix
29.comment: Interrogate Kafka with the Matrix of Prescience.

30.title: Sauntering Fox
30.description: Diplomacy is but a trade of opinions...
30.comment: Confer with the leader(s) of the Xianzhou Luofu.

31.title: Slayer of a Very "Deer" Friend
31.description: Try to walk on the Path of the Hunt...
31.comment: Help Xianzhou to defeat the Abomination of Abundance, "Ebon Deer"

32.title: The Deer Hunter
32.description: The Furnace Endured, the Antlers Obscured
32.comment: Save the Artisanship Commission from the crisis.

34.title: A Casualty of Armors
34.description: Receive a total of 10,000 DMG on 1 character in a single battle

35.title: A Song of Vice and Dire
35.description: Inflict both Burn and Freeze upon 1 enemy at the same time
35.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with blessings.

36.title: A Thousand Cuts...
36.description: Defeat 3 enemies using DoT in a single battle
36.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

37.title: Accidental Amnesia
37.description: Clear Decaying Shadow's Gauge Recollection and cause its ability, Liberation of the Golden Age, to fail
37.comment: Can be found in Backwater Pass (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Mirage (Stagnant Shadow).

38.title: Achilles' Horse
38.description: Defeat Voidranger: Trampler when it's aiming at an ally
38.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

39.title: Add Insult to Injury
39.description: Deal a total of 20,000 DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break in a single battle
39.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with weakness break blessings.

40.title: All Men Must Die
40.description: Receive a killing blow from enemies when at 100% HP
40.comment: Bring one weak unleveled unit against a tough enemy.

41.title: Always Come Prepared
41.description: A character has 5 or more buffs at the beginning of a turn
41.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe.

42.title: Annihilation
42.description: Deal equal to or more than 150,000 DMG in a single attack
42.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

43.title: Attack! No Matter the Cost!
43.description: Trigger Silvermane Lieutenant's Shield Reflect at least 4 time(s) and defeat it
43.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

44.title: Blade of Taixu
44.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

45.title: Bring a Gun to a Knife Fight
45.description: Deal 20000 DMG or higher to an enemy whose HP percentage is equal to or lower than 1% in a single attack

46.title: Break Till Broken
46.description: Inflict Weakness Break 4 time(s) upon the same enemy in a single battle

47.title: Bullet Time
47.description: Allies have 10 turns of action unbroken by enemies
47.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with the Path of Remembrance (freeze enemies perpetually).

48.title: Cataclysm Disruptor
48.description: Prevent the Doomsday Beast from using Impending Doom in Echo of War

49.title: Chad Norris
49.description: Defeat the Guardian Shadow without enraging it
49.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Fulmination (Stagnant Shadow), Forgotten Hall and Everwinter Hill.

50.title: Code of Chivalry
50.description: Defeat Gepard without defeating the Silvermane Guards that were summoned
50.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

51.title: Coffee Lover
51.description: In a single battle, use Himeko's Ultimate 3 times
51.comment: You can borrow a friend's Himeko.

53.title: Decapitation Strike
53.description: Defeat the Silvermane Lieutenant without defeating any Silvermane Guards
53.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

54.title: Deus Ex Machina
54.description: Inflict Weakness Break on enemies 3 time(s) using the Trailblazer (Destruction) in a single battle

55.title: Doldrums
55.description: Make Stormbringer fail to use Windfall Storm due to having no ally with Wind Shear
55.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 2.

56.title: DoT Breaker (I)
56.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

57.title: DoT Breaker (II)
57.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

58.title: Earthwork
58.description: An ally has a combined Shield effect greater than 5,000 at any time
58.comment: Best achieved in Simulated Universe with shield blessings and Gepard.

59.title: Electric Dreams
59.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Lightning Break DMG in a single battle

60.title: Energy Grandet
60.description: Have a character whose Energy is at 100% at the beginning of a turn for 4 turns in a row
60.comment: Easier to achieve with Simulated Universe energy blessings and Tingyun.

61.title: Et tu, Bronya?
61.description: Use Bronya to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Cocolia
61.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

62.title: Extreme Survival
62.description: Win a battle with all four allies having HP percentages equal to or less than 5%
62.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio in Simulated Universe.

63.title: Fahrenheit 451
63.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Fire Break DMG in a single battle

64.title: Fire Breaker (I)
64.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Fire Break DMG

65.title: Fire Breaker (II)
65.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Fire Break DMG

66.title: Follow-Up Breaker (I)
66.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

67.title: Follow-Up Breaker (II)
67.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

68.title: Foolish Little Brother...
68.description: Use Serval to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Gepard
68.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

69.title: Four-and-a-Half Pirouettes
69.description: Trigger Herta's talent with an ally's single attack, and have her twirl 5 time(s)
69.comment: Easiest to achieve in Silvermane Restricted Guard Zone Difficulty 1, Winter Soldier's March. 5 relatively weak enemies on that stage.

70.title: Friendly Fire
70.description: Defeat the Aurumaton Gatekeeper with the Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish's "Candle Flame"
70.comment: Can be found in the Cavern of Corrosion - Path of Conflagration.

71.title: Full Metal Jacket
71.description: Stay alive after being hit by the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit's Controlled Blasting ability
71.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 4.

72.title: Heavenly Hand
72.description: Use a Technique to defeat all enemies upon entering battle
72.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

73.title: Highway Star
73.description: Allies act for 100 times in a single battle

74.title: Hit It Where It Hurts Most
74.description: Defeat the Antimatter Engine without defeating either of the Doomsday Beast's hands in Echo of War
74.comment: Can be fought in Echo of War.

75.title: Homemade Crushed Ice
75.description: Defeat the Ice Edge summoned by Cocolia 4 time(s)
75.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

76.title: Hot-Blooded
76.description: Defeat Cocolia, Mother of Deception, without any ally being Frozen at any point of the battle in Echo of War
76.comment: Must be in Echo of War.

77.title: I Don't Get No Respect!
77.description: Enrage the Guardian Shadow with 4 character(s) in your team
77.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Fulmination (Stagnant Shadow), Forgotten Hall and Everwinter Hill. Just use the attack type she punishes you for with each character.

82.title: It's My Turn
82.description: Seele acts 5 time(s) in a row before the next ally unit's turn
82.comment: You can borrow a friend's Seele.

83.title: Ki Impact
83.description: Deal equal to or more than 20,000 DMG in a single attack

84.title: Lightning Breaker (I)
84.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Lightning Break DMG

85.title: Lightning Breaker (II)
85.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Lightning Break DMG

86.title: Listen...
86.description: Use the Trailblazer to fight boss Kafka and become Dominated by her
86.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

87.title: Memory, Sorrow, and Thorn
87.description: Inflict 4 DoT effects upon 1 enemie(s) at the same time
87.comment: Easiest to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

88.title: Morituri Te Salutant
88.description: Defeat an enemy when a character has less than 1% of HP left
88.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio in Simulated Universe.

89.title: Mozambique Drill
89.description: Defeat 3 enemies with follow-up attacks in a single battle
89.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

90.title: No Offense
90.description: Remove buffs on enemies 5 time(s) in a single battle
90.comment: Can be done with Pela or the Light Cone "Return to Darkness".

91.title: One on One
91.description: Enter combat with 4 character(s) but win with only 1 character(s) still standing
91.comment: Can be done by bringing in 3 weak units and 1 strong one.

92.title: Over-Protective
92.description: Win 1 battle(s) without having Gepard's Shields take any DMG
92.comment: You can borrow a friend's Gepard for this.

93.title: Passing as a Flower in the City of the Dead
93.description: Revive 2 downed character(s) in a single battle
93.comment: Easier to achieve with Destruction blessings in Simulated Universe.

94.title: Perpetual Freezer
94.description: Freeze 1 enemies for 3 turns in a row
94.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with plenty of freeze blessings.

95.title: Perish Song
95.description: Get knocked out together with the enemy
95.comment: There are Patrol Bots in Robot Settlement and Alchemists in Artisanship Commission (southwest) that explode when killed, dealing damage to you. With precise timing, kill them so that you get KO'd by the explosion. Only have 1 or 2 units on team.

96.title: Physical Breaker (I)
96.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Physical Break DMG

97.title: Physical Breaker (II)
97.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Physical Break DMG

98.title: Preemptive Strike
98.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

101.title: Regurgitation
101.description: Cause Frigid Prowler to fail to use Devour Otherling
101.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Rime (Stagnant Shadow).

102.title: Reverberating Ruin
102.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

103.title: Right-Hand Man's Many Right-Handed Right Hands
103.description: Defeat Svarog after destroying 4 Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit(s)
103.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 4.

104.title: Road to Canossa
104.description: Interrupt Cocolia's use of "Wraith of Winterland Saints" when she is charging
104.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6 or Echo of War. Either break or freeze her.

105.title: Save the Princess
105.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

106.title: Schrödinger's Other Cat
106.description: Inflict 5 Quantum Weakness Breaks in a single battle

107.title: Serial Breaker
107.description: Inflict Weakness Break to 4 enemies in a single action

108.title: Serious Punch
108.description: Deal equal to or more than 1,000 DMG in a single attack

109.title: Serval's Parting Gift
109.description: Use Serval to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Cocolia
109.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6 or Echo of War. With fast hands, you can reset the game and retry the battle if some other unit defeats Cocolia.

110.title: Sunstorm
110.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Wind Break DMG in a single battle

111.title: Surge of Tiles
111.description: Qingque starts her turn in the "Hidden Hand" state for 3 turn(s) in a row
111.comment: Requires RNG but also a fast team for better results.

112.title: Technique Breaker (I)
112.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

113.title: Thank You for Your Service
113.description: Defeat Bronya without defeating the Silvermane Guards
113.comment: Can be found in Forgotten Hall 14.

114.title: The Cold Equations
114.description: Inflict 5 Ice Weakness Breaks in a single battle

115.title: The Demolished Man
115.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Physical Break DMG in a single battle

116.title: The Limping Lupine
116.description: Defeat Automaton Direwolf without triggering Felling Order
116.comment: Can be found in Great Mine (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Spike (Stagnant Shadow).

117.title: Trauma Team Platinum Bundle
117.description: An ally heals for more than 8,000 HP in a single heal
117.comment: Best achieved in Simulated Universe with healing blessings.

118.title: Trial of Thirteen
118.description: In a single battle, make Svarog block attacks toward Clara 13 times
118.comment: It might be exactly 13 times on the dot.

119.title: Unimaginably Imaginary
119.description: Inflict 5 Imaginary Weakness Breaks in a single battle

121.title: When the National Anthem Rings
121.description: Have ally Bronya use "The Belobog March" 1 time(s) when fighting the bosses Gepard, Cocolia, and Bronya respectively
121.comment: Unfortunately you need to own Bronya to get this achievement.

122.title: Will of Steel
122.description: In a single battle against boss Kafka, dispel Dominated 3 times
122.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

123.title: Wind Breaker (I)
123.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Wind Break DMG

124.title: Wind Breaker (II)
124.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Wind Break DMG

125.title: Wrathful Aurumaton
125.description: In a single battle, cause Aurumaton Gatekeeper to enter the Wrath state 3 times
125.comment: Can be found in the Cavern of Corrosion - Path of Conflagration.

126.title: The Express Passenger's Guide to the Galaxy

137.title: The First and Last Freedom
137.description: Enter battle with 4 allies with HP percentage equal to or less than 1% in Simulated Universe
137.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio.

138.title: The Art of Loving
138.description: Allies receive Shields 50 times in Simulated Universe

139.title: Freeze!
139.description: Keep a single enemy Frozen for 10 turns in Simulated Universe
139.comment: Take the Path of Remembrance and pick Freeze blessings.

140.title: Elemental Reaction System
140.description: Deal 5 or more Types of DMG in a single attack in Simulated Universe

141.title: Your Opponent has Poor Connection
141.description: Allies take consecutive actions 20 time(s) in Simulated Universe

142.title: Twenty Four Love Poems and a Song of Despair
142.description: All allies have HP percentage equal to or less than 5% when winning a battle in Simulated Universe
142.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio in Simulated Universe.

143.title: We Call the Heart Dancing in the Dark the Moon
143.description: Have at least 3 enemy unit(s) be afflicted with Shock, Burn, Bleed, and Wind Shear simultaneously in Simulated Universe
143.comment: Take the Path of Nihility and use Path Resonance.

148.title: A Special Experience
148.description: Encounter 10 Special Event(s) in Simulated Universe

149.title: A Not-So-Special Experience
149.description: Encounter 100 Special Event(s) in Simulated Universe

151.title: Penrose Stairs
151.description: Complete exploring Simulated Universe at difficulty level 2 or higher

152.title: King of Infinity
152.description: Complete exploring Simulated Universe at difficulty level 4 or higher

153.title: Fevered Strike
153.description: Break 20 destructible object(s) in Simulated Universe

154.title: Rosebud
154.description: Break 400 destructible object(s) in Simulated Universe

155.title: Adrenaline
155.description: Actively Enhance Blessings 10 times in Simulated Universe

156.title: Infectious Good Luck
156.description: Actively Enhance Blessings 200 times in Simulated Universe

157.title: Do Android Snails Dream of Electric Trees?
157.description: Activate abilities in the Ability Tree 2 times

158.title: Expert Tree-Climber
158.description: Activate abilities in the Ability Tree 26 times

161.title: Who Moved My Pokeball?
161.description: Capture Trotters 1 times in Simulated Universe

162.title: A Porcine Football Team
162.description: Capture Trotters 66 times in Simulated Universe
162.comment: Good luck! Trotters are less likely to escape when CC'd.

163.title: Don't Let It Get Away!
163.description: Let Trotters escape 1 times in Simulated Universe

164.title: Existence Precedes Essence
164.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Preservation in Simulated Universe

165.title: Memories Look at Me
165.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Remembrance in Simulated Universe

166.title: Create a Beautiful Chaos
166.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Elation in Simulated Universe

167.title: Velocity of the Universe's Expansion
167.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of The Hunt in Simulated Universe

168.title: Wreck-It Self
168.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Destruction in Simulated Universe

169.title: Gnosticism
169.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Nihility in Simulated Universe

170.title: Exhalation
170.description: Unlock 12 Blessing(s) of Abundance in Simulated Universe

171.title: Millenium Bug in Amber
171.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Preservation when clearing Simulated Universe

172.title: You See Memories
172.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Remembrance when clearing Simulated Universe

173.title: Don't Worry Be Happy
173.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Elation when clearing Simulated Universe

174.title: The Speed of Thought
174.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of The Hunt when clearing Simulated Universe

175.title: Cool Guys Don't Look At Explosions
175.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Destruction when clearing Simulated Universe

176.title: The Plague of Fantasies
176.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Nihility when clearing Simulated Universe

177.title: Angel's Breath
177.description: Have 10 or more Blessing(s) of Abundance when clearing Simulated Universe

178.title: A Finger in Every Pie
178.description: Have Blessings from 6 or more Paths when clearing Simulated Universe

179.title: An Island Unto Oneself
179.description: Have 6 or less Blessing(s) when clearing Simulated Universe at difficulty level 2 or higher
179.comment: Extremely difficult, requires RNG just to avoid blessings in the first place.

180.title: Private Collector
180.description: Have 22 or more Blessing(s) when clearing Simulated Universe

181.title: Triangle Strategy
181.description: Flip cards 3 times in a single Nildis event in Simulated Universe

182.title: Master Ball
182.description: Have 8 or more Curio(s) when clearing Simulated Universe

183.title: A 4-Star Rarity Daydream
183.description: Have 0 or less Cosmic Fragment(s) when clearing Simulated Universe

184.title: It's Good to Be Rich!
184.description: Have 1,024 or more Cosmic Fragment(s) when clearing Simulated Universe

185.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
185.description: Clear Simulated Universe at difficulty level 2 or higher and use Techniques 25 times

186.title: Coherence
186.description: Clear Simulated Universe at difficulty level 2 or higher with 4 characters of the same Path

187.title: Does This Game Not Have a Platinum Trophy?
187.description: Clear Simulated Universe (Difficulty Level 2 and above) with all allies at full HP at the end of every battle
187.comment: Requires a Bailu or Gepard (or both) and mix of shield/heal blessings.

188.title: Console Game
188.description: Clear Simulated Universe at difficulty 2 or higher without using the Downloader

189.title: If I Can Stop One Heart From Breaking
189.description: Clear Simulated Universe at difficulty 2 or higher without breaking any destructible objects

190.title: Aleph is the Universe
190.description: Clear Simulated Universe at difficulty 2 or higher with only 1 character in the team
190.comment: Probably needs an extremely buffed Clara. Best done in Simulated Universe World 3.

191.title: On Fire off the Shoulder of Orion
191.description: Lose against Elite enemies in Simulated Universe

192.title: Glitter at the Tannhauser Gate
192.description: Lose against the Boss enemies in Simulated Universe

193.title: Lost Like Tears in Rain
193.description: Lose the battle in the tavern event in Simulated Universe
193.comment: You'll find this event randomly in Occurence.

194.title: Wake Up!
194.description: Lose the battle in the Nildis event in Simulated Universe
194.comment: You'll find this event randomly in Occurence.

205.title: Earth Week
205.description: Log in 7 days in a row

206.title: Earth Month
206.description: Log in for a total of 30 days

207.title: Earth Year
207.description: Log in for a total of 365 days

208.title: Karmic Wheel
208.description: Let the Higher Existence that lives within our hearts sigh at you
208.comment: Submit one Praise of High Morals during hidden events, including at the Fountain in the Administrative District.

209.title: Diogenes' Utopia
209.description: See what Belobog is famous for!
209.comment: Investigate all 10 trash cans in the Administrative District.

210.title: Insatiable
210.description: Sometimes, there can be too much of a good thing...
210.comment: Use the Vomit Inducing Agent consumable. You can get this recipe by talking to Maxime in Boulder Town, near Natasha's clinic.

211.title: Trashy Humor
211.description: One man's trash is another man's treasure
211.comment: Synthesize 10 Trash consumables. Trash can be found by breaking destructable objects on Jarilo-VI.

212.title: Saint
212.description: Let the Higher Existence that lives within our hearts give you a thumbs-up

213.title: Versatile Joker
213.description: Use a total of 20 character(s) to form a team with Sampo and win at least 1 battle
213.comment: You can borrow a variety of units from friends for this achievement.

214.title: One Big Happy Family
214.description: Win 1 battle(s) with a team comprising Himeko, Welt, Dan Heng, and March 7th
214.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

215.title: Architects (And Former Architects)
215.description: Win 1 battle(s) with a team comprising Bronya, Gepard, Pela, and Serval
215.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

216.title: It Takes Three
216.description: Win a battle with a team that has 3 characters of the same Path
216.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

217.title: Match-Three
217.description: Win a battle with a team that has 3 characters of the same Type
217.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

218.title: Lone Wolf
218.description: Win 10 battles with only one character on the team
218.comment: Easy to achieve in Simulated Universe World 1.

219.title: For the Amber Lord
219.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Preservation.
219.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

220.title: Ablution Dictum
220.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Destruction.
220.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

221.title: The Xianzhou Alliance
221.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of The Hunt.
221.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

222.title: Meaningless Achievement
222.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Nihility.
222.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

223.title: The Great Accord
223.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Harmony.
223.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

224.title: Knowledge is Power
224.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Erudition.
224.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

225.title: Miracles of Yaoshi
225.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 characters following the Path of Abundance.
225.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

226.title: Tempestuous Suppression
226.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Wind-Type characters.
226.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

227.title: Fulguration Beckoner
227.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Lightning-Type characters.
227.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

228.title: Total Conflagration
228.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Fire-Type characters.
228.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

229.title: Glacier Dynast
229.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Ice-Type characters.
229.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

230.title: Quantum Test
230.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Quantum-Type characters.
230.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

231.title: Imaginary Law
231.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Imaginary-Type characters.
231.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

232.title: Speak with Fists
232.description: Win 10 battles with a team that has 4 Physical-Type characters.
232.comment: You can borrow a relevant unit from a friend for this achievement.

233.title: Hot-Blooded Trailblazer
233.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

234.title: Pessimistic Trailblazer
234.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

235.title: Apologetic Trailblazer
235.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

236.title: The Echoer
236.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

237.title: Silent Trailblazer
237.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

238.title: The Meaning of Choice
238.comment: Only dialogue during a mission counts.

239.title: The Sorrows of Young Arlan
239.description: Complete Companion Mission "An Unexpected Turn of Events"

240.title: Guess Who I Am
240.description: Complete Companion Mission "You Already Know Me"

245.title: Seventeen's Map
245.description: Find all readable items regarding Asta in the mission "Emptiness of Locus Silentii"
245.comment: There are 3 readable items: Talking with Afro man 5 times in the middle of Master Control Zone, westernmost room of the Storage Zone at the topmost floor, and by defeating a boss top-right of the Base Zone Space Anchor.

246.title: Diamond and Rust
246.description: Give the log to Bernard in the mission, "To: The Faint Star"

247.title: Farewell, Comet Hunter
247.description: Collect three "Letters From the Comet Hunter" in the mission "Out of Reach"

248.title: Does She Walk Alone?
248.description: Complete the mission "Guide Paradox" and witness the android's ending

249.title: Close Encounters of the Sixth Kind
249.description: Obtain the ability to communicate with Wubbabboos in the mission "Requiem Mass"

250.title: Disposable
250.description: Find and talk to all Herta puppets in the space station

251.title: When Breath Becomes Air
251.description: Visit the researcher Eikura Shuu's memorial
251.comment: The memorial is found at the Westernmost room of the Storage Zone, at the topmost floor.

252.title: Bzzt! Clock Out!
252.description: Turn off the little robots in the space station 6 times

253.title: Door to A New World
253.description: Use the Curio "Door to A New World"
253.comment: Locate the "Toilet" object in Supply Zone and use it.

254.title: Just A Number
254.comment: Go to Storage Zone F1 bottom right room and interact with an object there.

255.title: No King Rules Forever
255.description: Use the Curio "Unbearable Weight" and decipher the contents of the mysterious sound
255.comment: Investigate a mysterious voice in the Storage Zone F2 top right room, then go to Storage Zone F1 top right room and investigate the Curio.

256.title: Green Thumb
256.description: Talk with the strange plant and visit it again on the next day
256.comment: The plant is on the second floor of Base Zone, at the far end. Interact with it again 1 day later.

257.title: Greed Psychology
257.description: Obtain the real treasure in the mission "Survival Wisdom"

258.title: One Day More
258.description: Find all of Julian's items in the mission "Hook's Treasure"

259.title: Moral Higher Ground
259.description: Confront the Public Property Protector and show him the cost of stopping you (or have him humbly acknowledge his wrongdoing.)
259.comment: Break a barrel on the east side of Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone and he may appear. Apologize to receive a Praise of High Morals.

260.title: For a Breath I Tarry
260.description: Choose to format Little Robot in the mission "Rarely Affectionate (Part 2)"
260.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from the Little Robot. Unlocks at TL34.

261.title: The Lifecycle of Software Objects
261.description: Choose to format Little Robot in the mission "Rarely Affectionate (Part 2)"
261.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from the Little Robot. Unlocks at TL34.

262.title: Outworlder
262.description: Return the music box found in Rivet Town to its heartbroken owner
262.comment: Once you have obtained "Dirty Ribbon Tied to a Bell", give it to the female voice from window at the north entrance to Rivet Town. Investigate again to get a "Damaged Music Box". Submit this box to the Anxious Woman in the alleyway southeast of Rivet Town.

263.title: 50 Credits!?
263.description: Collect all wanted posters of the Express Crew in Belobog
263.comment: There are 7 wanted posters located in Administrative District.

264.title: Twinkly, Winkly
264.comment: Found in destructible objects on Jarilo-VI, can also be obtained randomly from the Fountain in Administrative District.

265.title: Sweet Pom-Pom O'Mine
265.description: Try to give the Jarilo-VI's armillary sphere a spin to find... um... Pom-Pom on it?
265.comment: Investigate the Armillary Sphere near Bronya's desk in Qlipoth Fort. Pick "what is in the northwest".

266.title: Hurt Locker
266.description: Solve the crisis at the Belobog cable car station while also avoiding ethical risks
266.comment: Interact with a ticking suitcase near cable car in Administrative District. You may need a Praise of High Morals.

267.title: Labor Omnia Vincit
267.description: Examine file cabinets in the Seat of Divine Foresight 7 time(s)

268.title: Dance Like A Butterfly, Sting Like A Bee
268.description: Dominate all 5 tournaments in the Boulder Town Super League

269.title: Where It All Began
269.description: Return to the room where the Stellaron was kept and recall a blurred memory
269.comment: Go to the Storage Zone F1 bottom-right (fast travel to Gallery of Shadow).

270.title: Knight in Shining Armor
270.description: Find the language model and give it to Fidora the amateur mechanic
270.comment: Buy the Language Module from Ronald in Administrative District, and give it to Fidora near the Goethe Grand Hotel.

271.title: Honest Abe
271.description: Pass the test of integrity set up by a mysterious researcher
271.comment: Go to Storage Zone F2's Special Purpose Lab and interact with giant square in the center. Purposely lie three times here to possibly unlock another achievement "The Echoer", and then finally pick the 3rd option. This is an un-missable achievement.

272.title: The Mandela Effect
272.comment: Interact with the man behind a locked gate in the Administrative District, past Tamila, four times. Exit and re-enter this map for the man to re-appear after every interaction.

273.title: Natural Immunity
273.description: Obtain the recipe for fried rice from talking with Gertie at the Goethe Grand Hotel

274.title: Lā Lá Lǎ Là Land
274.description: Obtain the score for the phonograph from talking with Tamila at the Golden Theater

275.title: Winter City Trap
275.description: Finish listening to the vagrant's rap
275.comment: Located on Jarilo-VI, Robot Settlement, Vagrant Camp.

276.title: For Ages 12 and Up
276.description: Participate in the Dark Fist Tournament and become the ultimate winner
276.comment: Obtain the Dark Fist Tournament Invitation Letter in the Fight Club, then talk to the mysterious kid right outside and win against them. You're guaranteed to win 2/3 regardless of the choices you make.

277.title: The Kelly Gang
277.description: Excavate the treasure hidden in the Belobog Administrative District's fountain
277.comment: Interact with the Fountain in the Administrative District and submit 1 Praise of High Morals.

278.title: The Banality of Evil
278.description: Excavate the treasure hidden in the Belobog Administrative District's fountain
278.comment: Finish all the Fool's Box puzzles in the mission "Vessel of Mediocrity".

279.title: The Fourth Little Mole
279.description: Find all the hidden treasure in the Mission "The Adventurous Moles"

280.title: The Adventurous Moles Super Grown-Up Edition
280.description: Buy The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure from the Belobog Book Merchant
280.comment: Achievement does not exist / is bugged / may need additional information.

281.title: A Simple Life
281.description: Receive a text from Luhui after completing the mission "Fired"

282.title: Carpe Diem, Festina Lente, and Tempus Fugit
282.description: Receive all the texts about Chengjie's fasding passion after completing the mission "A Teacher and a Friend".

283.title: Tootsie
283.description: Choose to have the Foxian Beauty reveal their true identity during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"
283.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Foxian Beauty. Quest unlocks at TL38.

284.title: Cyber Fraud
284.description: Choose to have the Foxian Beauty turn themselves in during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"
284.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Foxian Beauty. Quest unlocks at TL38.

285.title: A Secret Makes a Woman, Woman.
285.description: Choose to let the Foxian Beauty continue the ruse during the mission "From Xianzhou With Love"
285.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Foxian Beauty. Quest unlocks at TL38.

286.title: Fair and Square
286.description: Win the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship openly and fairly
286.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship.

287.title: All Is Fair in Love and War
287.description: Win the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship in underhanded ways
287.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship.

288.title: From Hero to Zero
288.description: Lose the Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship
288.comment: You can only get one of the three achievements from Xianzhou Luofu Competitive Eater Championship.

289.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
289.description: Talk with the Immortal in a Vase and obtain its gift from the vase
289.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from the Immortal in a Vase. Find it North of the Exalting Sanctum and attack it to trigger dialogue. Come back a day later to get achievement.

290.title: Let the Wind Blow Where It May
290.description: Talk with the Immortal in a Vase and refuse its gift
290.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from the Immortal in a Vase. Find it North of the Exalting Sanctum and attack it to trigger dialogue. Come back a day later to get achievement.

291.title: Hasta la vista, Hexanexus!
291.description: Complete 15 Hexanexus challenge(s) from the Hex Club

292.title: Rubik's Headache
292.description: Complete 15 new Hexanexus challenge(s) from the Hex Club

293.title: The Crimes That Bind
293.description: Stop the strange tourist from throwing a coin into the starskiff engine
293.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from strange tourist throwing coin. Talk to a tourist top left of Central Starskiff Haven.

294.title: Flight Cancelled
294.description: Help the strange tourist to throw a coin into the starskiff engine
294.comment: You can only get one of two achievements from strange tourist throwing coin. Talk to a tourist top left of Central Starskiff Haven.

295.title: Lost and Found
295.description: Retrieved the credits that the fraudster took
295.comment: You can only get one of three achievements from the fraudster. Fraudster mini quest begins by talking to a Weapon next to a wall in Central Stafskiff Haven.

296.title: Leave It There
296.description: Did not retrieve the credits that the fraudster took
296.comment: You can only get one of three achievements from the fraudster. Fraudster mini quest begins by talking to a Weapon next to a wall in Central Stafskiff Haven.

297.title: Have Your Cake and Eat It
297.description: Retrieved more credits from the fraudster than what they took
297.comment: You can only get one of three achievements from the fraudster. Fraudster mini quest begins by talking to a Weapon next to a wall in Central Stafskiff Haven.

298.title: Seven Birds in the Hand Is Worth A Thousand in the Bush
298.description: Help Heron Express to recover all lost cycranes
298.comment: There are 7 cycranes. Start by speaking to the depressed cycrane in Central Starskiff Haven.

299.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Sloth
299.description: Convince the depressed cycrane to return to its job
299.comment: Located top-right in Central Starskiff Haven.

300.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Lust
300.description: Follow the gentlemanly cycrane to find the picture book withheld by customs
300.comment: Located at the very bottom of Cloudford F1.

301.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Gluttony
301.description: Complete a bet with the dissatisfied cycrane
301.comment: Located by the Grocery Store Owner in Central Starskiff Haven.

302.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Greed
302.description: Explore the "mountain of deliveries" protected by the "evil dragon"
302.comment: Located at the very top of Cloudford F1.

303.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Envy
303.description: Complete the challenge from the resentful cycrane
303.comment: Located east of the Earthrise Agora space anchor in Central Starskiff Haven. Find it by walking along the path it gave you (even though it's wrong), and you'll find it resting next to a Palace.

304.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Wrath
304.description: Defeat the highwaymen with the brave cycrane
304.comment: Located a little bit south-west of Burgeoning Space Anchor in Stargazer Navalia.

305.title: The Seven Errors of Cycranes: Pride
305.description: Complete the challenge from the "Four Great Villains of the Luofu (Self-Proclaimed)"
305.comment: Located east of Realm-Keeping Commission Chancery in Exalting Sanctum, with two kids.

306.title: Until the Light Takes Us
306.description: Activate 5 Space Anchors in the Herta Space Station

308.title: Where the Celestial Path May Lead
308.description: Activate 10 Space Anchors on the Xianzhou Luofu

309.title: Proper Role-Playing Gamer
309.description: Open Treasures 30 times on the Herta Space Station

311.title: A Drop in the Bucket
311.description: Open Treasures 100 time(s) on the Xianzhou Luofu

314.title: Take by Surprise
314.description: Enter combat with attacks of corresponding Types for 100 time(s)

317.title: Dissertation Proposal
317.description: Collect 10 readable item(s) in the Herta Space Station

318.title: Literature Review
318.description: Collect 50 readable item(s) in the Herta Space Station

321.title: Glued to Books
321.description: Collect 30 readable items from the Xianzhou Luofu

322.title: Learned in All Things
322.description: Collect 80 readable items from the Xianzhou Luofu

323.title: Red-Name Alert
323.description: Complete the Formidable Foe Challenge 5 time(s)

324.title: High-Level Domination
324.description: Complete the Formidable Foe Challenge 15 time(s)

326.title: You Want Me to Raid Without Achievements?
326.comment: You can repeat any difficulty mission in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone (An Eye for an Eye or Winter Soldiers' March) for this achievement.

329.title: Unearthly Marvel
329.description: Find all of the Unearthly Marvel treasures

331.title: The Birth of Tragedy
331.description: Find all of The Fool's Box treasures

332.title: Sisyphus of the Mines
332.description: Complete the final Mine Cart Test

334.title: Red to Red and White to White

335.title: Don't You Dare Waste It
335.description: Get Jim Roger Bread Soda from a trash can

339.title: Sensory Socialization
339.description: Collect all Memory Bubbles scattered on the Herta Space Station
